casebody.data:
THE ROBERT A. SCOTT. THE CHARLES H. PERKINS. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 14, 1916.) Nos. 189, 190. Appeals from the District Court of the United States for the Eastern District of New York. Foley & Martin, of New York City (William J. Martin and G. V. A. McCloskey, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Convers & Kirlin, of New York City (J. P. Kirlin and Robert S. Erskine, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before COXE, WARD, and ROGERS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
